external_games.name: EARTH DEFENSE FORCE: WORLD BROTHERS - Hostess ILI from Dream Club, Giving the EDF a Try!?

name: Earth Defense Force: World Brothers - Hostess ILI from Dream Club, Giving the EDF a Try!?
summary: This allows you to use a special character and that character's weapon. This hostess was chosen to join the fight from "Dream Club," a club for adults that can only be joined by those with a pure heart.
